thread.title: Norwegian Introduces à La Carte Dining
thread.title_full: Norwegian Introduces à La Carte Dining

title: Norwegian Introduces à La Carte Dining
text:
Norwegian Introduces à La Carte Dining July 14, 2015 
Norwegian Cruise Line is letting guests choose à la carte specialty dining at the cruise line’s signature specialty restaurants. Starting in October, guests can dine a la carte at any of the 11 complimentary dining options on the Norwegian Escape. The restaurants will feature new menus and offer guests a choice on how many courses they’d like to enjoy with per-item pricing. For more information, go to Norwegian’s dining website . 0
